summary.span: 服务活动，用于实现由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务协定定义的操作。

span.span: Service activity that implements an operation defined by a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service contract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 当工作流实现 WCF 服务协定中定义的操作时，使用活动。The activity is used when a workflow implements an operation defined in a WCF service contract. 可以实现已定义的服务协定中的操作，也可以在工作流本身中定义服务协定和操作。The can implement an operation from an already defined service contract or can define the service contract and operation within the workflow itself. 后者称为工作流优先协定。The latter is known as a workflow-first contract. 活动支持一组预定义的消息交换模式。The activity supports a set of predefined message exchange patterns. 这些模式包括：These patterns include: - 单向接收One-way receive 发送消息的客户端不需要该服务发送响应。The client that sends the message does not expect the service to send a response. 协定操作应具有 void 返回类型。The contract operation should have a void return type. - 接收请求 - 发送响应Receive request - Send response 活动接收并处理一条消息后，会向客户端发回一个响应。After a message is received and processed by the activity, a response is sent back to the client. 如果协定操作具有 void 返回类型，则会向发送活动发回确认。When the contract operation has a void return type, an acknowledgement is sent back to the send activity. - 接收请求 - 发送错误Receive request - Send fault 活动接收并处理一条消息后，会向客户端发回一个响应或错误。After a message is received and processed by the activity, a response or a fault is sent back to the client. > [!NOTE] > 若要确保正确执行持久性且不保留瞬态消息，请确保 的子活动自身不会持续。To ensure that persistence performs properly and does not persist transient messages, make sure that child activities of the do not persist by themselves. 例如，如果创建持久性提供程序时 `UnloadOnIdle` 设置为 `true`，则当子活动处于空闲状态时，可能发生这种情况。This can occur if the child activities go idle when a persistence provider was created with `UnloadOnIdle` set to `true`, for instance. > [!NOTE] > 此活动是 .NET Framework 3.5 的一部分。This activity is part of .NET Framework 3.5. 有关 .NET Framework 4 中的等效活动，请参阅 。For the equivalent activity in .NET Framework 4, see .

public: property bool CanCreateInstance { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanCreateInstance : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置操作是否将导致创建新的工作流服务实例。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the operation causes a new workflow service instance to be created.

value.span: 如果创建新的工作流实例，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a new workflow instance is created; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 设置为 的 `true` 活动表示一个服务操作，当不作为对话的一部分由服务客户端调用时，此服务操作将导致创建服务工作流的新实例。A activity that has set to `true` represents a service operation that, when invoked by a service client without being part of a conversation, causes a new instance of the service workflow to be created. 客户端无法使用服务操作调用来实例化不具有 设置为 的 `true` 活动的服务工作流。Service workflows that do not have a activity with set to `true` cannot be instantiated by a client using a service operation invocation. 使用关联的 对象的 方法可以创建这样的工作流。Such workflows can be created using the method of the associated object. 此属性的默认值为 `false`。The default value for this property is `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 `CanCreateInstance` 属性。The following example shows how to set the `CanCreateInstance` property. 此代码根据 `Conversations` 文件中的 `ShipperWorkflow.designer.cs` SDK 示例改写。This code was adapted from the `Conversations` SDK sample, from the `ShipperWorkflow.designer.cs` file. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上下文信息用于客户端与服务（将与客户端通信）之间的通信并包括关联标识之类的内容。Context information is used for communication between the client and the service it is communicating with and includes such things as identification for correlation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问 `Context` 属性。The following example shows how to access the `Context` property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Workflow::Activities::ContextToken ^ ContextToken { System::Workflow::Activities::ContextToken ^ get(); void set(System::Workflow::Activities::ContextToken ^ value); };
member this.ContextToken : System.Workflow.Activities.ContextToken with get, set

summary.span: 表示一个可用于指定上下文的令牌，应当使用该令牌来关联 活动和该活动与之通信的客户端之间的交换。

span.span: Represents a token that can be used to specify the context that should be used to correlate the exchange between a activity and the client that the activity is communicating with.
A that can be used for correlation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 均在所有者活动的范围内定义。Each is defined within the scope of an owner activity. 用户可以建立名称相同但所有者范围不同的两个不同的上下文令牌模型。Users can model two distinct context tokens with the same name but different owner scopes. 与这些上下文令牌关联的上下文的值在运行时将有所不同。The value of the contexts associated with these context tokens are different at runtime. 默认情况下，每个工作流都具有一个隐式根上下文令牌，其范围是根活动级别。By default, each workflow has an implicit root context token, scoped at the root activity level. 根上下文令牌的名称为“(RootContext)”， 为 `null`。The name of the root context token is '(RootContext)' and the is `null`. 如果 活动没有与其关联的 ，则将使用根上下文标记。If a activity does not have a associated with it, the root context token is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 `ContextToken` 属性。The following code example shows how to access the `ContextToken` property. 此代码示例根据 `Conversations` 文件中的 `SupplierWorkflow.Designer.cs` SDK 示例改写。This code example is adapted from the `Conversations` SDK sample, from the `SupplierWorkflow.Designer.cs` file. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#1)]

public: property System::ServiceModel::FaultException ^ FaultMessage { System::ServiceModel::FaultException ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::FaultException ^ value); };
member this.FaultMessage : System.ServiceModel.FaultException with get, set

summary.span: 接收活动完成执行时返回的异常。

span.span: The exception that is returned when a receive activity completes execution.

value.span: 一个包含错误消息文本和详细信息的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the fault message text and details.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为 类型的实例，则活动完成时会向客户端返回错误。If the property is set to an instance of type , the fault is returned to the client upon completion. 如果在活动执行期间引发了异常，并且设置了 属性，则会向客户端返回指定的错误。If an exception is thrown during the activity execution and the property is set, then the specified fault is returned to the client. 如果在活动执行期间引发了异常并设置了 属性，而且关联的操作具有 特性（该特性指定与 属性匹配的错误类型），则通道没有出错，客户端仍然可以和服务器通信。If an exception is thrown during the activity execution and the property is set, and the associated operation has a attribute that specifies a fault type that matches that of the property, then the channel is not faulted and the client can still communicate to the server. 如果未设置 属性，则引发的异常将作为错误返回到客户端。If the property is not set, the thrown exception is returned as a fault to the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 `FaultMessage` 属性。The following code sample shows how to access the `FaultMessage` property. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FaultMessageProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 表示针对 属性的 。

span.span: Represents the that targets the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此依赖项属性可用于设置接收活动的 属性和 类型的公共工作流属性/字段或其他活动的相同类型的公共属性/字段之间的绑定。This dependency property can be used to set up a binding between the receive activity's property and a public workflow property/field of type or another activity's public property/field of the same type. 此依赖项属性也可用于设置与 活动的 属性关联的值。This dependency property can also be used to set the value associated with the property of a activity. 此依赖项属性还可用于获取与 活动的 属性关联的绑定或值。This dependency property can also be used to get the binding or value associated with the property of the activity.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig object GetWorkflowServiceAttributes(object dependencyObject) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetWorkflowServiceAttributes (dependencyObject As Object) As Object

param.name: dependencyObject
param.span: 要从中检索服务属性的对象。

span.span: The object to retrieve the service attributes from.

summary.span: 返回由 活动实现的服务的 属性。

span.span: Returns the attributes for the service implemented by the activity.

summary.span: 这些属性包括多项，如 、、 和是否在从 活动返回的任何错误中包括异常详细信息。

span.span: These attributes include items like the , the , the , and whether to include exception details in any faults that are returned from the activity.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示包含服务属性数据的 对象。

span.span: A that represents a object that contains service attribute data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个由 活动定义的附加依赖项属性。The property is an attached dependency property defined by the activity. 此依赖项属性附加到根工作流中，该根工作流包含在设计时使用 方法调用的 活动。This dependency property is attached to the root workflow that contains the activity using the method call at design time. 属性用于在工作流服务启动时定义应用于工作流服务的服务级行为属性。The property is used for defining service-level behavior attributes that are applied to the workflow service when it starts. 在运行时无法修改这些属性。These cannot be modified at runtime. > [!NOTE] > 如果当前工作流使用 活动启动另一个工作流，则被调用的工作流不会继承发出调用的工作流的服务属性。If the current workflow starts another workflow using an activity, the invoked workflow does not inherit the invoking workflow's service attributes. > [!NOTE] > 如果为一个自定义活动设置服务属性，并且该活动包括在工作流中，则会使用这些服务属性。If service attributes are set for a custom activity and that activity is included in a workflow, those service attributes are used. 只有在自定义活动本身作为工作流运行的情况下，才会为自定义活动使用服务属性。Service attributes are only used for custom activities if the custom activity itself is run as a workflow. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 `GetWorkflowServiceAttributes` 方法。The following example shows how to use the `GetWorkflowServiceAttributes` method. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#5)]

Public Custom Event OperationValidation As EventHandler(Of OperationValidationEventArgs)

summary.span: 在接收到操作的消息并且需要验证时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a message is received for an operation and validation is required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个可选的事件处理程序，它在 活动即将收到消息时激发。This is an optional event handler that is fired when the activity is about to receive a message. 可以使用关联的处理程序来执行基于 ClaimSet 的安全检查，以对由 活动实现的服务操作的客户端调用进行授权。The associated handler can be used to perform ClaimSet-based security checks to authorize client invocation of the service operation implemented by the activity. 在事件处理程序中将 设置为 `false` 会拒绝服务操作调用，并且客户会收到 。Setting to `false` in the event handler rejects the service operation invocation and the client receives a . 如果将 设置为 `true`，则服务操作调用将成功完成，并且 活动将接收并处理消息。If is set to `true`, then the service operation invocation succeeds and the activity receives and processes the message. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 `OperationValidation` 事件。The following example shows how to use the `OperationValidation` event. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly OperationValidationEvent As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 表示针对 事件的 。

span.span: Represents the that targets the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此依赖项事件属性可用于将接收活动的 事件绑定到工作流类上的公共事件处理程序。This dependency event property can be used to bind the receive activity's event to a public event handler on the workflow class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ParameterBindings As WorkflowParameterBindingCollection

summary.span: 获取服务的形参表中可绑定参数的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of bindable parameters as found in the service's formal parameter list.
The of parameters to bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用于指定服务操作参数与包含 活动的工作流的公共字段/属性之间的绑定。 can be used to specify a binding between the service operation parameters and public field/properties of the workflow that contain the activity. 当客户端调用操作时，会在接收活动执行期间写入相应的参数值以绑定工作流属性。When a client invokes the operation, the corresponding parameter values are written to bound workflow properties during the receive activity's execution. 接收活动的子活动也可以使用 读取客户端调用传入的参数值。 can also be used by the receive activity's child activities to read the parameter values passed in by client invocation. 子活动可以使用 集合来设置父级 活动的返回值。Child activities can use the collection to set the return value of the parent activity. 服务协定的所有参数都应该包含在 `ParameterBindings` 属性中。All parameters of the service contract should be included in the `ParameterBindings` property. 未绑定的参数将导致在编译时生成编译器警告，并且在 将此消息返回到客户端时，可能会发生异常。Unbound parameters cause compiler warnings upon compilation and an exception can occur when the returns this message back to the client. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问 `ParameterBindings` 属性。The following example shows how to access the `ParameterBindings` property. 此代码根据 `Conversations` 文件中的 `ShipperWorkflow.designer.cs` SDK 示例改写。This code was adapted from the `Conversations` SDK sample, from the `ShipperWorkflow.designer.cs` file. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Workflow::Activities::OperationInfoBase ^ ServiceOperationInfo { System::Workflow::Activities::OperationInfoBase ^ get(); void set(System::Workflow::Activities::OperationInfoBase ^ value); };

summary.span: 定义 活动实现的协定和服务操作。

span.span: Defines the contract and service operation that the activity implements.

value.span: 一个 对象，其中包含协定名称、协定类型、操作名称（可能与方法名称截然不同）、操作是否为单向操作以及包括有关操作的参数在内的方法信息。

span.span: An object that contains the contract name, the contract type, the operation name, (which could be distinct from method name), whether the operation is a one-way operation, and method information including parameters about the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将 属性设置为 或 类型的实例。The property can be set to an instance of type or . 可用于使用现有 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务协定来配置接收活动。 can be used to configure a receive activity using an existing Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service contract. 的实例可用于为工作流优先协定方案配置接收活动。An instance of can be used to configure a receive activity for the workflow-first contract scenario. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问 `ServiceOperationInfo` 属性。The following example shows how to access the `ServiceOperationInfo` property. 此代码根据 `Conversations` 文件中的 `ShipperWorkflow.designer.cs` SDK 示例改写。This code was adapted from the `Conversations` SDK sample, from the `ShipperWorkflow.designer.cs` file. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetWorkflowServiceAttributes (object dependencyObject, object value);
.method public static hidebysig void SetWorkflowServiceAttributes(object dependencyObject, object value) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetWorkflowServiceAttributes (dependencyObject As Object, value As Object)
public: static void SetWorkflowServiceAttributes(System::Object ^ dependencyObject, System::Object ^ value);
static member SetWorkflowServiceAttributes : obj * obj -> unit

param.name: dependencyObject
param.span: 要向其应用服务属性的对象。

span.span: The object to apply the service attributes to.

param.name: value
param.span: 包含要应用的服务属性数据的 对象。

span.span: The object that contains the service attribute data to apply.

summary.span: 设置由 活动实现的服务的属性。

span.span: Sets the attributes for the service implemented by the activity.

summary.span: 这些属性包括多项，如 、 和是否在从 活动返回的任何错误中包括异常详细信息。

span.span: These attributes include items like the , the , and whether to include exception details in any faults that are returned from the activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个由 活动定义的附加依赖项属性。The property is an attached dependency property defined by the activity. 此依赖项属性附加到根工作流中，该根工作流包含在设计时使用 方法调用的 活动。This dependency property is attached to the root workflow that contains the activity using the method call at design time. 属性用于在工作流服务启动时定义应用于工作流服务的服务级行为属性。The property is used for defining service-level behavior attributes that are applied to the workflow service when it starts. 在运行时无法修改这些属性。These cannot be modified at runtime. > [!NOTE] > 如果当前工作流使用 活动启动另一个工作流，则被调用的工作流不会继承发出调用的工作流的服务属性。If the current workflow starts another workflow using a activity, the invoked workflow does not inherit the invoking workflow's service attributes. > [!NOTE] > 如果为一个自定义活动设置服务属性，并且该活动包括在工作流中，则不会使用这些服务属性。If service attributes are set for a custom activity and that activity is included in a workflow, those service attributes is not used. 只有在自定义活动本身作为工作流运行的情况下，才会在自定义活动中使用服务属性。Service attributes are only used in custom activities if the custom activity itself is run as a workflow. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 `SetWorkflowServiceAttributes` 方法。The following example shows how to use the `SetWorkflowServiceAttributes` method. [!code-csharp[ReceiveActivity#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/receiveactivity/cs/snippets.cs#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个由 活动定义的附加依赖项属性。The property is an attached dependency property defined by the activity. 此依赖项属性附加到根工作流中，该根工作流包含在设计时使用 方法调用的 活动。This dependency property is attached to the root workflow that contains the activity using the method call at design time. 属性用于在工作流服务启动时定义应用于工作流服务的服务级行为属性。The property is used for defining service-level behavior attributes that are applied to the workflow service when it starts. 在运行时无法修改这些属性。These cannot be modified at runtime.
